container-title: The following discussion keeps the less pregnant En­ Page 285 glish term, "an experience"
title: Die Erlebnisgesellschaft: Kultursoziologie der Gegenwart

Erlebnis has the same root as the Swedish upplevelse and translates roughly into "living through something," an event that turns experience into an experience, something uplifting and out of the ordinary—something with an end and a beginning and thus also articulated and transformed into expression
The result is what Schulze calls Erlebnisrationalität—a systematization and routinization of an orientation toward searching for experiences
